status_message:
As the year comes to an end, there's one thing we want to say: thank you. 

When Media Matters started over a decade ago, Fox News and the right-wing echo chamber could get away with lies left and right. That's not the case anymore. 

This past year alone, we stood up against right-wing lies about women's health, income inequality, police brutality, climate change, and many more. When right-wing misinformation even infiltrated mainstream media like the New York Times, we stood up against it â€“ and we could not have done any of it without you. 

We've hindered the ability of right-wing media to infiltrate the public debate, but we have to be vigilant. We know that they won't stop fearmongering and lying in 2016. 

That is why we need your year-end financial support as we prepare for 2016 and the unique challenges it will bring. Help us fight back against right-wing bigotry and lies in 2016 with a tax-deductible donation: http://mm4a.org/donate2015
As another year comes to an end, we take a look back to just some of the inanity we've seen from the media this year.
link_name: The Worst in Media: 2015
